name: MACH: A Fast Finality Layer for Rollups Leveraging Restaking
description: In this talk, we present the design and implementation of a fast finality layer for Ethereum-based rollups called Mach. This joint work by AltLayer and EigenLayer aims to provide instant and secure finality for rollups, improve cross-domain interactions and boost liquidity and go beyond some of the limitations of ZK proof verification.
